title: Fix lints and tests for sandbox-pooling PR #17
description: PR #17 (feature/sandbox-pooling) has failing lints and tests. Fix compilation errors, clippy warnings, and test failures.
resolution: Fixed formatting issues in pool.rs (cargo fmt). CI lint job was failing due to import ordering and function signature formatting.

title: LLM Tool-Calling Integration
description: Add schema export in standard LLM formats (OpenAI, Anthropic, Generic). Add export_tool_schemas() and execute_tool_call() methods to Sandbox. Makes Eryx drop-in for AI agent workflows.

title: Sandbox/Session Pooling
description: Add managed pool of warm sandbox instances with SandboxPool, PooledSandbox, and PoolStats. Performance optimization for high-throughput scenarios.

title: Fix lints and tests for network-callback PR #15
description: PR #15 (feature/network-callback) has failing lints and tests. Fix compilation errors, clippy warnings, and test failures.
close_reason: Tests and lints pass - stale precompiled artifacts locally, CI passes

title: Persistent Named Sessions
description: Add disk persistence for sessions with save/load methods. Add SessionRegistry for named session management. Enables long-running workflows across process restarts.

title: Fix lints and tests for stderr-capture PR #13
description: PR #13 (feature/stderr-capture) has failing lints and tests. Fix compilation errors, clippy warnings, and test failures.

title: Fix lints and tests for persistent-sessions PR #16
description: PR #16 (feature/persistent-sessions) has failing lints and tests. Fix compilation errors, clippy warnings, and test failures.

title: Built-in Network Callback
description: Provide optional security-controlled network callback with host allowlist, timeout, max response size, and method restrictions. Biggest capability gap vs Modal/E2B.

title: Activity/Idle Tracking
description: Add activity tracking to sessions with last_activity(), idle_duration(), execution_count(), total_execution_time(). Add SessionStats struct. Resource management for long-lived sessions.

title: Execution Cancellation
description: Add cancellation support with ExecutionHandle and execute_cancellable() method. Use Wasmtime epoch-based interruption. Essential for production deployments with runaway code.

title: Fix lints and tests for llm-tool-calling PR #14
description: PR #14 (feature/llm-tool-calling) has failing lints and tests. Fix compilation errors, clippy warnings, and test failures.

title: Fix lints and tests for execution-cancellation PR #18
description: PR #18 (feature/execution-cancellation) has failing lints and tests. Fix compilation errors, clippy warnings, and test failures.

title: Stderr Capture and Streaming
description: Capture stderr independently and include it in ExecuteResult. Add on_stderr method to OutputHandler trait. Essential for AI code execution debugging.

title: Fix lints and tests for activity-tracking PR #19
description: PR #19 (feature/activity-tracking) has failing lints and tests. Fix compilation errors, clippy warnings, and test failures.
